statements: SELECT * FROM user_interactions
SELECT user_id, post_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type='like'
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT post_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 10 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS num_users FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT MAX(interaction_date) AS latest_interaction_date FROM user_interactions;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, COUNT(*) FROM user_interactions GROUP BY post_id;
SELECT user_id, post_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT comment_id, comment_text, user_id FROM comments WHERE post_id = 1 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT post_id, MAX(created_at) AS latest_interaction FROM user_interactions GROUP BY post_id;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1 AND post_id = 5;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, post_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT post_id, user_id, comment_text FROM comments WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT MAX(interaction_id) FROM user_interactions;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, post_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT post_id, COUNT(*) AS total_likes FROM Likes GROUP BY post_id ORDER BY total_likes DESC;
SELECT user_id, comment_text, comment_time FROM Comments WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY comment_time;
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT post_id, COUNT(*) AS like_count FROM Likes GROUP BY post_id HAVING like_count > 5;
SELECT user_id, post_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, comment_text FROM Comments WHERE LENGTH(comment_text) > 50 ORDER BY comment_time ASC;
SELECT U.user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions, COUNT(L.like_id) AS total_likes FROM UserInteractions U LEFT JOIN Likes L ON U.user_id = L.user_id GROUP BY U.user_id HAVING total_interactions > 10;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE post_id = 1
SELECT content, author_id FROM posts WHERE author_id = 2
SELECT post_id, content, created_at FROM posts ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM likes WHERE user_id = 3
SELECT post_id, user_id, created_at FROM comments
SELECT * FROM posts ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT post_id, content, created_at FROM posts WHERE author_id = 1
SELECT post_id, content, author_id, COUNT(like_id) AS total_likes FROM posts LEFT JOIN likes ON posts.post_id = likes.post_id GROUP BY post_id
SELECT posts.post_id, posts.content, likes.user_id AS liker_id, likes.created_at AS like_date FROM posts JOIN likes ON posts.post_id = likes.post_id
SELECT post_id, content, COUNT(comment_id) AS total_comments FROM posts LEFT JOIN comments ON posts.post_id = comments.post_id GROUP BY post_id HAVING total_comments > 5
SELECT * FROM likes;
SELECT post_id, like_timestamp FROM likes WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, count(post_id) AS total_likes FROM likes GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT post_content FROM posts WHERE post_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY post_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_timestamp < '2022-05-01';
SELECT user_id, post_id, like_timestamp FROM likes ORDER BY like_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, post_id, post_content FROM posts WHERE user_id = '123' AND post_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, post_id FROM shares WHERE user_id = '456';
SELECT user_id, post_id, comment_text FROM comments WHERE user_id = '789' ORDER BY comment_timestamp ASC;
SELECT posts.post_id, users.username, posts.post_content FROM posts JOIN users ON posts.user_id = users.user_id;
